name: node-1m-rps
description: High-performance Node.js application targeting 1M requests per second

scripts.build:csharp: cd frameworks/csharp && dotnet publish -c Release -r linux-x64 /p:PublishAot=true -o build && rm -f build/*.dbg build/*.staticwebassets.endpoints.json build/csharp.*
scripts.build:csharp-noaot: cd frameworks/csharp && dotnet publish -c Release -r linux-x64 /p:PublishAot=false -o build && rm -f build/*.dbg build/*.staticwebassets.endpoints.json
